div.p: Scapytain is a web application that can help to manage test campaigns using Scapy snippets.
Scapytain offers 4 spaces: tests, test plans, test means and campaigns .
The test space holds tests, organized by test groups. Each version of the test code is remembered. Tests may have dependencies on other tests.
Each test plan is a collection of objectives, grouped by sections.

A test mean is a description of a set of physical resources, associated with some initialization code. This can be used if, for intance, an equipment is present with IP 10.0.0.30 on a bench and 172.16.1.30 on another, to create tests independant from this and use the value provided by the test mean initialization code.

A campaign gathers a set of test plans. A campaign is launched by creating a campaign run. A campaign run contains all the tests needed to check their objectives, plus dependency tests. A campaign can have a default test mean. Each campaign run can change this default.
